snippet: The Prussian, government this morning, publishes a memorial presented to its colleagues in the Zollverin, explaining the motives by which it was led in concluding the treaty with Hanover. In consequence of notices from the French police, about the...
lead_paragraph: The Prussian, government this morning, publishes a memorial presented to its colleagues in the Zollverin, explaining the motives by which it was led in concluding the treaty with Hanover. In consequence of notices from the French police, about the plot discovered at Paris, the police in all parts of Germany has commenced searching the houses of all leaders of the so-called "communities of Free Religion," which are treated as political Unions.
